message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $11,500. I believe it presents a great value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $10,000?
I understand you have a budget, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  I could consider coming down to $11,000. This offer represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider that?
